Feminised Seeds

Feminised Seeds

Why Choose Our Feminised Seeds? Barneys Farm's best feminised seeds collection is a stunning selection of some of the world's best and most sought-after female cannabis strains. Unleash the full potential of your cannabis garden with the unparalleled benefits of feminised seeds.

Pioneers of feminised seeds, we boast the title of being the world's premier supplier of feminized cannabis seeds. As a cultivator, embracing feminised cannabis seeds opens a realm of immeasurable benefits, such as amplified yields, potent trichome composition with elevated THC and CBD concentrations, aromatic and flavour-rich bouquets, punctual floral cycles, and optimised cultivation efforts and spatial utilisation through the elimination of male cannabis plants.

What Makes Barneys Feminised Seeds So Special? With a plethora of cannabis cup awards and accolades, our exclusive collection of Barney's Farm's best feminised seeds is a veritable treasure trove of new and exciting strains, including the sought-after Wedding Cake and Purple Punch.

How do you make a seed feminised? The actual process of seed feminisation forces female plants to spread their pollen to other female plants, forcing the creation of seed feminisation.

Your search for the best feminised seeds is over! Entrust your seed feminisation procedure to a name you know and trust. Barney's Farm has honed its craft of creating feminised seed strains over the years and stands firmly behind the quality of its offerings. With a guarantee of freshness and viability, you can be sure that your purchase of feminised cannabis seeds will result in a flourishing garden.

From classic Cali strains to innovative hybrids, Barney's Farm has an extensive collection to cater to every cultivator's needs. In choosing Barney's Farm, you choose the finest and the very best feminised seeds with guaranteed freshness and viability. Our extensive portfolio encompasses the finest genetics from across the globe, including premium USA feminised seed strains and exciting new European hybrids.

SELECT COUNTRY FIRST I am not 18 or older

Content for people of 18 years of age or older, entering barneysfarm.com is reserved for people at the age of majority. In the Netherlands, the age of majority is 18 years old, Germany 21 years old, check your local laws and respect them. We dispatch our marijuana seeds with the reservation that they will not be used in conflict with national laws. Customers must be aware that cannabis seeds are illegal in some countries. Barneys Farm provides these seeds on condition that they will not be taken to countries where they are illegal. Those doing so are solely responsible for their own actions and Barneys Farm accepts no responsibility in this regard. Our online store complies with Netherlands law. Seeds are sold strictly for souvenirs, storage and genetic preservation. General legal notice: Germination is illegal in most countries, please check your country's law regarding seeds, paraphernalia and other products related with Cannabis culture.

Our website uses cookies to offer a better user experience, please accept their use for the best website and browsing experience. OK ?
